entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023
